BYFPageTitle: Before you file a confirmation statement
BYFInfoHoldParagraph: Check that all the limited partnership information we hold is correct.
BYFFileUpdatesParagraphStart: If anything has changed, you must
BYFOnlyInfoChangedParagraph: The only information you can update within the confirmation statement are the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) codes.
BYFInsetParagraph1: Any updates you file may not show immediately in this service.
BYFInsetParagraph2: You do not need to wait for update filings to be accepted. As long as they've been submitted, you can file the confirmation statement.
BYFCheckboxText: I have checked the limited partnership information and submitted any updates
